attributes.action: Provide a tax lottery for tax payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown & Brit Gov.

I think it would be an excellent idea if the gov. were to randomly select National Insurance Numbers, with a view to giving those people some tax money back.

I would suggest that five people be given £ 500,000, each, ten people could be given £ 10,000 each, twenty people could be given £ 5,000 each and 300,000 people could be given £1,000 each.

If my maths are correct this ammounts to one million pounds of tax payers money, our money.

Recipients would of course have to be tax payers and should have been paying tax for at least 10 years, this could also include pensioners, who get a bum deal from all and every gov. which happens to be in power.

It could also be a vote winner for you, and may even be viewed as your best domestic policy.

Steve Edwards
